description: Determine the share of total expenditures for Jamaica.
Which country has the highest share of total expenditures?
Calculate the average share of total expenditures across all listed countries.
Identify any country that has a significantly lower share of expenditures compared to others.
Determine if there is a correlation between the country and its share of total expenditures.
What countries have a share of total expenditures greater than 0.2?
Rank the countries from the highest to the lowest share of total expenditures.
Identify the range of the share of total expenditures across all countries.
What percentage of the countries have a share of total expenditures above 0.15?
Identify any clusters of countries with similar shares of total expenditures.
